title.rendered: Yoga Day celebrated across Mission Education centers

content.rendered:
Yoga Day was celebrated across all Mission Education centers of Smile Foundation. Children performed yoga asana together at their respective centers. Practicing yoga is an important part of our daily lives as yoga improves metabolism; increases flexibility and muscle strength, improves respiration, energy and also improves athletic performance. The teachers spoke to the students about the benefits and motivated them to practice the same everyday for better health.

Mission Education is a national level programme of Smile Foundation, which is committed to providing basic education and healthcare to underprivileged children.

Smile Foundation is an NGO in India directly benefitting over 600,000 children and their families every year, through more than 250 live welfare projects on education, healthcare, livelihood and women empowerment, in over 950 remote villages and slums across 25 states of India.
